title: Here’s what you get when spending $10K+ on a Mac Studio and Studio Display config
content:
The most exciting news out of Apple’s “Peek performance” event was the all-new Mac Studio with the M1 Ultra chip and companion Studio Display. While the combo starts under $4,000, here’s what you get if you opt for the $10,000+ maxed-out Mac Studio setup.

more…

The post Here’s what you get when spending $10K+ on a Mac Studio and Studio Display config appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Here's what you get with the maxed-out Mac Studio with M1 Ultra and Studio Display that run over $10,000 combined.
